AddIndex rec2_riversUpd FROM_NODE FROM_NODE_Index NON_UNIQUE ASCENDING
AddIndex rec2_riversUpd TO_NODE TO_NODE_Index NON_UNIQUE ASCENDING
AddField rec2_riversUpd LENGTHDOWN DOUBLE # # # LENGTHDOWN NULLABLE NON_REQUIRED #
AddIndex rec2_riversUpd FROM_NODE FROM_NODE_Index NON_UNIQUE ASCENDING
AddIndex rec2_riversUpd TO_NODE TO_NODE_Index NON_UNIQUE ASCENDING
CalculateField rec2_riversUpd segslpmean atn( abs([upElev]- [downElev])/ [euclid_dist])*57.2958 VB #

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

descript.abstract: REQUIRED: A brief narrative summary of the data set.
descript.purpose: REQUIRED: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: rivers4b

timeperd.current: REQUIRED: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.

sngdate.caldate: REQUIRED: The year (and optionally month, or month and day) for which the data set corresponds to the ground.

status.progress: REQUIRED: The state of the data set.
status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

bounding.westbc: REQUIRED: Western-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.
bounding.eastbc: REQUIRED: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.
bounding.northbc: REQUIRED: Northern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
bounding.southbc: REQUIRED: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.
theme.themekey: REQUIRED: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.

idinfo.accconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the data set.
idinfo.useconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for using the data set after access is granted.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Attributes associated directly with network:

Field

Type

Description

Catarea

Real

Watershed area in m2

CUM_Area

Real

Area upstream of a reach (and including this reach area) in m2.

Nzsegment

Integer

Reach identifier to be used with REC2 (supercedes nzreach in REC1).

nz_fnode

Integer

Unique number of preceding river segment's outlet node.

nz_tnode

Integer

Unique number of following river segment's inlet node.

Lengthdown

Real

The distance to coast from any reach to its outlet reach, where the river drains (m).

Headwater

Integer

Number (0) denoting whether a stream is a source (headwater) stream. Non-zero for non-headwater streams.

Hydseq

Integer

A unique number denoting the hydrological processing order of a river segment relative to others in the newtork.

StreamOrder

Integer

A number describing the Strahler order a reach in a network of reaches.

euclid_dist

Real

The straight line distance of a reach from the reach inlet to its outlet.

upElev

Real

Height (asl) of the upstream end of a reach section in a watershed (m).

downElev

Real

Height (asl) of the downstream end of a reach section in a watershed (m).

upcoordX

Real

Easting of the upstream end of a river segment in m (NZTM2000).

upcoordY

Real

Northing of the upstream end of a river segment in m (NZTM2000).

downcoordX

Real

Easting of the downstream end of a river segment in m (NZTM2000).

downcoordY

Real

Northing of the downstream end of a river segment in m (NZTM2000).

sinuosity

Real

Actual distance divided by the straight line distancegiving the degree of curvature of the stream

nzreach_rec1

Integer

The REC1 identifiying number for the corresponding\closest reach from REC1 (can be used to retrieve the REC management classes)

headw_dist

Integer

Distance of the furthermost source or headwater reach from any reach (m).

Shape_length

Real

The length of the reach (vector) as calculated by ArcGIS.

Segslpmax

Real

Maximum segment slope along length of reach.

Segslpmean

Real

Mean segment slope along length of reach.

LID

Integer

Lake Identifier number(LID) of overlapping lake.

Reachtype

Integer

A value of 2 is assigned if the segment is an outlet to the lake, otherwise 0 or null.

nextdownid

integer

segment number of the most downstream reach

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
